flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=19>>19 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 19-3=<<19-3=16>>16 more ceilings to paint.
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
